text: Man accused of shooting woman multiple times deemed competent to stand trial More stories from [WLWT](/@WLWT2020) Join the flipboard community Discover, collect, and share stories for all your interests [Sign up](/signup) More stories from [Crime](/topic/crime) [Substitute teacher fights student in crowded Vegas school hallway](/topic/crime/substitute-teacher-fights-student-in-crowded-vegas-school-hallway/a-8YXXzklSRUagH7_qYg53_A%3Aa%3A1944816596-d5ef7e979a%2Fnypost.com) A Las Vegas substitute teacher and a teen student unleashed a barrage of punches on each other after a classroom argument over a reported slur … [Utah Karen Gets Arrested After Pulling Down Teen Girl’s Skirt Saying It Was “Too Short”](/topic/crime/utah-karen-gets-arrested-after-pulling-down-teen-girl-s-skirt-saying-it-was-too/a-4KIm6CvJQdSXq-LuDlMvvw%3Aa%3A1827601826-b5ea0a9a8e%2Fboredpanda.com) A “Karen” from Utah, USA, who was exposed in a viral TikTok video that has since been taken down for pulling down a teenager’s mini skirt because it …
